visionDescription: To lead the market for the distribution of bakery products, waiting for our customers to recognise us because we have improved their quality of life through our logistics and the quality of the products we distribute. To share our unique tastes, with the best and most responsible attention and tone.
missionDescription: We are a young and growing regional company that offers a personalised service of home deliveries of baked goods on weekends and holidays. We know how important bread is in every home. That's why we try to ensure that our high quality and fresh products reach every dinner table. Breakfast is the most important meal of the day and we provide its foundation. For our customers, we offer easy delivery terms and an attractive price-quality ratio.
objectivesDescription: Be the best alternative in the market
onlyOneAddress: You have just one address. Cannot delete it.
servicesText1: The baked goods are freshly baked in a regional bakery.
servicesText3: We deliver very early on weekends and public holidays, before you wake up. We deliver the baked goods directly to your door.
notBakeryAvailable: There are not products available for this location
fromDateBeforeTo: From date must be before To date
dateFuture: From date must be in the future
info-extra-order: In the case of having a subscription for this day, the orders will be added. The extra order is not cancelled due to holidays.
paymentsDescription: Bills can be paid conveniently by SEPA direct debit.
password-conditions: Password must contain at least 8 characters, 1 upper case letter, 1 lower case letter and 1 number.

contactAdvisorDescription: We are here to help you! Complete this form to have a Deliezius advisor in your area contact you. He will be able to help you both with technical consultations and to accompany you in your purchase process.
discoverMoreDescription: We are here to help you! Complete this form to have a Deliezius advisor in your area contact you. He will be able to help you both with technical consultations and to accompany you in your purchase process.

first-deck-info: We bring the baked goods to your doorstep very early, when they are still asleep. So you can start your day with freshly baked bread and other delicious baked goods by simply opening the front door and taking out the baked goods that have been lovingly packaged for you.
how-service-works: Would you like to know how our service works?
orderDateFuture: Order's date must be in the future. You cannot create an order after Friday 3pm until Monday 00am
invalidDateOrder: Orders can be created or modified from Monday 00am to Friday 15pm.
entrega: To ensure the quality and freshness of your delivery, we ask you to take appropriate precautions so that we can place the baked goods protected from the weather. You can leave a cool box or insulated bag at your front door for us to put your baked goods in.
